content:encoded:
This week on Case Closed, we begin with the FBI In Peace And War and their story from December 8, 1954, The Collector.

(25:05) Philo Vance closes the show this week with The One Cent Murder Case. That episode aired July 12, 1949.

Download CaseClosed706

Case Closed is made possible by your support. If you’re able to help, visit donate.relicradio.com for more information. Thank you!
